alert.note: Alert for Barnstable; Eastern Plymouth; Southern Plymouth; Western Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 16 at 3:38AM EST until January 16 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches, with total snowfall of two to four inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Western and Southern Plymouth County. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.* * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... Up to 1" of additional snowfall expected across SE MA through this evening as part of the long fused light precipitation event that began on Sunday, prompting the advisory to be expanded through this evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Barnstable; Eastern Plymouth; Southern Plymouth; Western Plymouth
